title: IIHM's Young Chef Olympiad 2026 Opens in Bengaluru with Spectacle, Soul, and a Shared Heart for Food
desc: Bengaluru (Karnataka) [India], February 3: The 12th IIHM International Young Chef Olympiad (YCO) 2026 opened in Bengaluru with the kind of scale, theatre, and emotion that instantly signals a world event--an evening designed not just to 'begin' a competition, but to ignite a global movement of young culinary talent. From the very first moments, the ceremony carried the mood of an international arena: teams seated with their country buddies- IIHM students assigned to look after their wellbeing; a charged sense of anticipation in the room, and an atmosphere where tradition, innovation, and youthful ambition all shared the same spotlight.

title: Mozilla Adds One-Click Option to Disable Generative AI Features in Firefox
desc: Mozilla will release Firefox 148 with a new settings toggle that lets users completely turn off all current and future generative AI features.

title: Samuel L. Jackson: Hollywood Icon Enjoys Safari Getaway in Kenya

title: Price competition likely to limit cost impact of beverage container return scheme on consumers: MSE
desc: The experience in other jurisdictions showed that the deposit return schemes did not have a significant direct impact on beverage prices or beverage sales, said Senior Minister of State for Sustainability and the Environment Janil Puthucheary.

title: Nigeria Hands Over Africa Energy Bank Headquarters to APPO
desc: Nigeria has officially handed over the fully furnished headquarters of the Africa Energy Bank to the Association of African Petroleum Producing Countries.

title: Renewables over 50%, wholesale prices down - is the energy transition… succeeding?
desc: It wasn’t so long ago pundits claimed Australia’s grid couldn’t run on higher than 20% renewables. Now it’s 50%.
